complexText_1.content: Javascript errors are handled gracefully in the
high-level component. Error 404 (not found) is handled gracefully in the

complexText_2.content: When an error occurs, a beautiful page is shown and users can reach out support through the

complexText_3.content: By default, it will open the Crisp customer chat (if crisp.id is present in config.js). Here's the

complexText_4.content: If crisp.id is not set up in the config.js file, it will open the user mail client (mailto:) and let them them an email to your email support (mailgun.supportEmail in config.js)
